Objective

Get the highest score you can.

Controls

The ship follows the mouse. Left click to fire a laser. Right click to fire a bomb. Holding left click will begin locking on, and then releasing it will fire homing-darts. Ammo is unlimited but overheating decreases the fire rate.

Enemies

Fighter Kamikaze Bomber Spinner
Fighter (1 point)
The most basic unit, these aren't the brightest pilots. Move towards you and shoot! Move towards you and shoot! Barely a step up from space invaders intelligence.
Kamikaze (2 points)
These pilots have nothing to lose. Strapped into a ship without weapons, all they can do is slowly drift forwards until they spot an enemy to run into.
Bomber (5 points)
Why aim when you have explosives? Bombers meander across the battlefield dropping bombs and hoping they hit something.
Spinner (10 points)
Aerodynamics mean nothing in space, but that doesn't make these spinning ships any less ridiculous to look at.
